short_summary: Purchase of Victoria Class Submarine Spare Parts.
description: Trade Agreement: CETA/WTO-AGP/CPTPP/CFTA/FTAs with Peru/Colombia/Panama/Korea/UK. Tendering Procedures: All interested suppliers may submit a bid. Competitive Procurement Strategy: Lowest/Lower Bid. Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: No. The Department of National Defence has a requirement to purchase parts in support of the Victoria Class Submarines which are to be delivered to Halifax, Nova Scotia and to Victoria, British-Columbia. The Contractor must supply the items as detailed in Annex A - Line Item Details. Delivery Date: As soon as possible. Bids will remain open for acceptance for a period of not less than 90 days from the closing date of the bid solicitation. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. This procurement is subject to the following Trade Agreements: The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), The World Trade Organization-Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO- GPA), The Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Columbia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement.
full_summary:
# Multiple Victoria Class Submarine Spare Parts

**Tender Details**
* **Reference Number**: PW-VCI-010-29233
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Solicitation Number**: W8482-241992/A
* **Publication Date**: 2023-12-11
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-03-28T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2024-02-28

**Procurement Information**
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements**
The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Columbia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement

**Delivery Details**
* **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia and Nova Scotia
* **Delivery Date**: As soon as possible

**Bid Requirements**
* **Bid Documents**: Available in both official languages of Canada
* **Document Submission**: Electronic submissions accepted through the CanadaBUs buying system
* **Bid Evaluation**: Lowest price will be the primary factor in bid evaluation

**Contracting Authority**
Contact Dominic Marois, Contracting Authority, Public Services and Procurement Canada, at dominic.marois@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for any questions or concerns regarding this tender.
